entry.title: Check Out the Whitespace Theme README
entry.content:
This is the Themespace demo blog of the Whitespace theme (for Octopress). Click “Read On” to find out more. All other posts on this website are auto-generated text and code to showcase its appearance.

This first post is a link post. Click the title to navigate to the theme’s GitHub repository – where you can also find links to real blogs using slightly customized versions of Whitespace.
